firm_data.name: Tradeify Funding
firm_data.description:
At Tradeify, we empower talented traders to trade and earn payouts through a streamlined 3-step process designed to maximise opportunity and minimize personal financial risk. Our program begins with a trading challenge, progresses to a simulated funded stage, and culminates in a live funded account for consistent and successful traders.

Tradeify provides cu tting-edge tools to support your trading journey, including automated journaling to analyze and improve performance, and a dedicated trader support team to guide you every step of the way. Our platform offers a seamless trading experience with transparent rules, disciplined risk management practices, and opportunities to scale to significant capital. 

With Tradeify, you’re not just trading—you’re leveraging advanced technology and personalized support to build a successful and lasting partnership. See more

reviews.title: Above and beyond, solution oriented customer service
reviews.content: My account started acting up out of nowhere and was somehow triggering a signal that it was failed when it clearly wasn't and the team at Tradeify was able to help get my account working again. It misbehaved like this over multiple days and my orders were being rejected and I was unable to trade, but each day someone got back to me and fixed it so that I wasn't missing out too much. Once this showed a repeated behavior after the first two instances, Tim then stepped in and assisted me and got my account working correctly, and without any repeat issues! He even explained to me what was going on and what solution they would offer as a next step if this odd issue did occur once again. Absolutely fantastic customer service overall! They clearly care about their customers and want to resolve the issues we experience, so it's well worth being patient and understanding while they work to resolve things because they will definitely find a fair resolution for the problem you're experiencing. Couldn't be happier with how things worked out and I am incredibly grateful for all of the help I received!

reviews.title: Honest Review of a Funded Trader
reviews.content: At first, Tradeify seemed like a solid prop firm. The positive reviews gave me confidence, but my actual experience turned out very different.From the start, their platform had technical issues: my drawdown limits didn’t show, and parts of the dashboard weren’t functioning. Then, within just a week of trading, they suddenly changed some key drawdown rules for funded traders, without clear communication. When I reached out, they referred me to a “minor update” posted in their Discord and said there was nothing they could do for me.As a result of the rule change and system malfunctions, I lost 85% of the capital I had built up. I came close to losing my $100K funded account. Not because of poor trading, but because of poor infrastructure and last-minute rule changes.To be honest, it felt like a calculated move by Tradeify to tighten rules while their dashboard wasn’t working properly. In my eyes a convenient way to offload funded traders.
reviews.reply_content: Hi Davy, Thank you for taking the time to share your detailed experience, and I sincerely apologize for our delayed response to your review. This level of delay in addressing serious concerns is unacceptable, especially given the significance of the issues you've raised. I also apologize for the technical issues you encountered with the dashboard and the frustration this caused with your trading. You're absolutely right that we had dashboard display issues in early May 2025, and our CEO addressed these problems directly in our Discord community with workarounds and fixes. These technical glitches were unacceptable, and we worked quickly to resolve them. Regarding rule changes, I want to clarify that the only recent policy update was the removal of payout windows in May 2025, which was actually a significant benefit to all traders - allowing daily payout requests instead of waiting for specific windows. This change made payouts more accessible, not more restrictive. I want to address your concern about this being a "calculated move to offload funded traders" directly: this is absolutely not the case. We genuinely want our traders to succeed and would never intentionally create barriers for funded traders or make changes designed to cause account failures. I'd like to personally investigate what happened with your account during this period. The loss of 85% of your built-up capital due to technical issues is something we take very seriously. Please reach out to me directly at tim@tradeify.co with your account details so I can review exactly what occurred and determine if there were system malfunctions that contributed to your losses. We value our funded traders immensely and want to ensure any legitimate technical issues are properly addressed. Best regards, Tim Mills Tradeify Support Team

I want to address your concerns directly: we absolutely do not operate as described in your review. Our policies and rules are clearly outlined in our help center at https://help.tradeify.co/en/ and remain consistent throughout the evaluation and funding process. We don't look for excuses to liquidate accounts - all liquidations occur based on the predetermined rules that are transparent from day one. If you believe your account was liquidated unfairly or outside of our published rules, I'd be happy to review the specific details of what happened. Please reach out to me directly at tim@tradeify.co with your account information so I can investigate the circumstances of your account liquidation. We stand behind our transparent policies and fair treatment of all traders. Best regards, Tim Mills Tradeify Support Team

This firm has masterfully redefined the landscape, providing traders with an unparalleled opportunity to harness institutional capital while benefiting from a seamless, meritocratic structure.From the outset, Tradeify.co distinguishes itself through its meticulous trader evaluation process—rigorous yet equitable, designed to identify and empower truly skilled market participants. Their model is underpinned by an unwavering commitment to rewarding proficiency, ensuring that those who demonstrate consistency and risk management acumen are duly compensated with access to substantial trading capital.What sets Tradeify.co apart is not merely its selective approach but also its extraordinary payout system. Unlike many proprietary firms that encumber traders with convoluted withdrawal structures or opaque terms, Tradeify.co exemplifies transparency and efficiency. Payouts are processed with remarkable expediency, allowing traders to reap the rewards of their diligence without bureaucratic impediments. This level of reliability fosters an ecosystem where traders can focus entirely on refining their craft, secure in the knowledge that their earnings are handled with integrity and professionalism.Furthermore, their trader support infrastructure is exemplary, characterized by responsiveness and genuine commitment to success. Whether addressing technical inquiries or offering nuanced market insights, Tradeify.co ensures that traders are equipped with the necessary resources to thrive in the competitive realm of financial markets.In a sector where skepticism often overshadows opportunity, Tradeify.co stands as an exception—an institution that not only upholds its promises but consistently exceeds expectations. For any serious trader seeking a prop firm that values skill, integrity, and financial reward, Tradeify.co is an unequivocal recommendation.Would I entrust my trading future to them? Unquestionably.

reviews.content: I have been trading for over 10 years.  I have worked with many funding firms over the years as well. I Spent over 45-60 days to get an account funded and passed, paid their fees, slowly built it up only for a day of major issues with their platform to fail the account.  There were no candles to be seen and orders were not executing.  By the time anything could be done on my end, the account was blown.  While service was quick to respond, they said it was not their problem.  Keep in mind they said this while not even looking at the account! I pointed out that over 30+ people in my discord also experienced the very same issues and showed proof.  I cannot continue to recommend this firm as they do not stand behind their traders.  Platform issues do occur and the one that ends up paying is the trader... they are all about the money - YOUR MONEY - this is not fair to the trader and I highly recommend staying away from this firm as they will not support you.
reviews.reply_content: Thanks for your feedback. We understand how frustrating platform issues can be. As outlined in our terms—agreed to by all traders upon sign-up—Tradeify does not correct individual account losses caused by isolated platform errors. We only step in when there is a confirmed widespread issue across the system. While we reviewed your case and responded promptly, we did not find a firm-wide outage at the time. We truly regret that this affected your experience and wish you the best in your future trading. Sincerely, The Tradeify Team

All account terminations are based on our published rules and policies, which have remained consistent and are clearly documented in our help center at https://help.tradeify.co/en/. We don't arbitrarily terminate profitable accounts, as that would go against our business interests. If you believe your accounts were terminated in error or if you'd like clarification on which specific rule violations led to the terminations, please reach out to me directly at tim@tradeify.co with your account details so I can review the specific reasons for the terminations. reviews.reply_content: Hi there, I sincerely apologize for our extremely late response to your review. I understand your frustration with the slippage and spread issues you experienced. The pattern you're describing - slippage increasing from 5 pips to 15 pips and causing significant losses - is definitely concerning. It's important to clarify that Tradeify operates in a simulated trading environment where orders are filled on the bid and ask. High slippage typically occurs during particularly volatile market periods or when trading illiquid contracts, especially during rollover periods when older contract months have reduced liquidity. The dramatic increase in slippage you experienced could be related to market conditions, contract liquidity, or the specific instruments you were trading during those periods. However, I'd like to investigate your specific situation to understand what caused the execution quality changes you noticed. Please reach out to me directly at tim@tradeify.co with your account details and the specific dates when you experienced the increased slippage. I can review your trading data and help determine if there were market conditions or contract selection factors that contributed to the poor execution. Best regards, Tim Mills Tradeify Support Team

reviews.title: Passed the challenge profit target and they failed my account!
reviews.content: I bought a $150,000 advance challenge account. Traded the first day and made $38000 dollars thus exceeding the profit target of $9000. But accidentally traded again and lost $10,000. So I still had $28000 in profit exceeding the target by 4x and they failed me for exceeding the max drawdown even though I passed the profit target! They were not willing to work with me at all!
reviews.reply_content: Hi Jason, I sincerely apologize for our very late response to your review. I understand your frustration about your account being failed despite reaching the profit target. Let me clarify how our Advanced challenge accounts work, as there seems to be some confusion about the rules. Advanced accounts use an intraday trailing drawdown system, which means both the profit target AND the drawdown rules must be satisfied simultaneously. While you did achieve the $9000 profit target for the $150k account, if you exceeded the $4500 trailing drawdown limit at any point during trading, the account would be automatically failed regardless of your final profit level. The trailing drawdown tracks your peak balance in real-time and moves the failure point upward as you gain profits, but it can still be triggered if losses exceed the limit during trading. This is clearly outlined in our help center at https://help.tradeify.co/en/ under "Rules: Trailing Max Drawdowns." We also offer Growth and Straight to Sim Funded accounts that use end-of-day trailing drawdowns, which provide more flexibility during the trading day since only your end-of-day balance affects the drawdown calculation. Given the time that has passed since February, I understand this may be frustrating to revisit, but I wanted to provide clarity on how the system works for future reference. If you would like to discuss this further, you can contact me directly at tim@tradeify.co. Best regards, Tim Mills Tradeify Support Team

reviews.title: I bought a 150k advanced account
reviews.content: I bought a 150k advanced account, i failed it initially and went and bought a reset.I got into 3k of profit before the trade reversed on me and i got stopped out at 148500. Which is exactly the drawdown limit.In the specifications of the account i read the drawdown rules. It states that the drawdown trails your profit.However, it does not clearly states that it trail unrealized gains like for instance on Apex accounts. I read it as realized gains when you took profit, not end of day but immediatelly.If i had known this i would have never bought an account in the first place, let alone buy a reset. I would like to warn others about this who i believe will also be mislead by the wording of the drawdown.If your firm has any decency i would like to get my reset refunded and strongly suggest you change your wording to not mislead customers.
reviews.reply_content: Hi Koen, I sincerely apologize for our very late response to your review. Thank you for the detailed feedback about your trading experience. I understand your frustration with being stopped out at the $148,500 drawdown limit after reaching $3k in profit. I want to clarify that our Advanced accounts clearly specify "intraday trailing drawdown" both during the purchase process and in our help center documentation. This means the drawdown tracks your account value in real-time throughout the trading day, including unrealized gains and losses, which is clearly outlined in our policies. However, I understand that different prop firms may handle drawdowns differently, and we recognize that this real-time tracking approach may not suit every trading style. This is exactly why we offer Growth and Straight to Sim Funded accounts that use end-of-day trailing drawdowns, which only adjust based on your closing balance and provide more flexibility during the trading day. For traders who prefer not to have intraday fluctuations affect their drawdown calculations, our Growth or Straight to Sim Funded accounts might be a better fit. All of this information is available in our help center at https://help.tradeify.co/en/ under our drawdown rules documentation. If you'd like to discuss this further, you can contact me directly at tim@tradeify.co. Best regards, Tim Mills Tradeify Support Team

reviews.title: Awesome Customer Experience
reviews.content: I am new to Tradeify Funding, having dealt with many of its competitors in the past and currently.  I recently attempted to open a number of Advanced evaluation accounts using a coupon code that I obtained on YouTube.  For 2 of the 5 accounts, I entered the correct code and received the discounted accounts.  However, for the final 3 accounts, my web browser filled in the discount code, but I failed to apply it to my orders.  Therefore, I ended up paying full price when I had intended to enter a discount code.  I explained my error to Tradeify in an email, and they promptly responded with emails showing that they refunded the amounts by which I "overpaid."  I must say that I was pleasantly surprised and amazed!!! Had this been any other prop trading firm, I expect that I would have been told that the error was my fault and that I needed to be careful in the future because all sales are final!  Because of Tradeify Funding's kindness and fairness in dealing with me, they have obtained a loyal and satisfied customer in me.  I can highly recommend them to any prop trader looking to establish a relationship with an honest and reputable prop trading firm.

For traders in restricted countries who cannot access live accounts, this has always been clearly communicated in our "Rules: Restricted Countries" article. reviews.title: Cards Flagged and Blocked with No Reasoning Given (Edit: Cards Were Unblocked!)
reviews.content: All of my cards were blocked from purchasing anymore resets, and I was not given a specific reason why. I was simply told that my cards will no longer be accepted by the payment processor for resets, purchases, or renewals.I tried four different cards, and they were all denied. The issue was not my cards, and the issue was not my banks.I researched the discord and found that many people have had this issue in this past, but I did not see any specific solutions for them either. Many of them were told that it is their bank, not their chosen payment processor. Others were told that there is nothing to do about cards being denied by a payment processor.I have spent quite a bit of money with prop firms like Topstep, Apex, and TradeDay (more than I've spent with this company). I've purchased many resets with these other companies, and I've never been denied through their payment processors. It's nice to know that these prop firms will not unnecessarily flag you for spending money in accordance with their rules.No, I have never charged back anything from Tradeify, neither have I charged back anything in my life.Yes, I was using my own cards with my legal name, all with the same billing address.No, I did not have multiple registered accounts.No, I did not have more than the 5 max allotted accounts.No, I was not rude to customer service.I offered to show my ID to prove that these were my purchases, but this offering was ignored and unneeded from their perspective.EDIT: After my review, Tradeify took another look at my account and allowed me to make new purchases. As of April 2025, I have not had any issues with any purchases or resets. I have even managed to receive two payouts, which were both quickly approved. I wish the issue could have been remedied without having to leave a negative review initially. Thank you, Tradeify.
reviews.reply_content: Thank you for sharing your detailed feedback. We deeply regret that your experience with us did not meet your expectations, and we appreciate the opportunity to address your concerns. First, we want to clarify that Tradeify does not control the payment processor or their internal flagging systems. These systems are managed independently and are designed to protect against fraud, though we understand they can sometimes mistakenly flag legitimate transactions. In response to your situation, we have made adjustments to our system settings that may allow you to complete transactions successfully in the future. We encourage you to try again if you feel comfortable, and we are here to assist you if you encounter any further issues. We can assure you that Tradeify has not intentionally denied your transactions or flagged your accounts for any improper reason. We value every client and aim to provide fair and reliable service across the board. Thank you for acknowledging the positive aspects of our company and our mission. While we regret losing the opportunity to continue working with you, we genuinely hope you find success with whichever firm you choose. If there’s anything else we can do to address your concerns or assist further, please don’t hesitate to reach out to us directly. Best regards, The Tradeify Team

reviews.title: Deceptive, Dishonest, and Deviant
reviews.content: I traded my butt off for three weeks, and when I was up 6,000, and my payout was imminent, (8,000 target), that's when the ghost orders started. Not only were they sell orders, when I only buy(Long), but the number was way more than I would normally trade anyway. Let's get this straight, these are all facts that they could easily verify by reviewing my trade history. When I tried to get help, they laughed in my face and called me a liar. Not only did they not fix the issue, but it continued to happen, in front of my eyes, while I am being called a liar. Let me make one thing clear, I am a profitable trader, with several XFA's through another company, and wanted to try another prop firm company, so I would have a little variety. Big Mistake. This company robbed me. There are no if's, and's, or butt's about it. I would not spend my time writing this review, but since I am certified psychologist, and live by ethics and rules, it would be a violation from a personal perspective not to inform you of my experience. I would not recommend this company to anyone, and my experience was horrible. This was all right before CHRISTMAS no less. It was a Little salt in the wound, but thank god there are reputable companies out here, and I will be staying far, far, away from this one.
reviews.reply_content: We are sorry to hear about your experience and appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback. However, we must address several inaccuracies in your claims. We have thoroughly reviewed your account history, and there is no evidence to support the allegations of "ghost orders" being placed by our system.
